DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_PERFOMANCE_LAST_WEEK
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT
 E.NOME,
 D.META,
 D.REALIZADO
FROM K_CRM_PERFORMANCEANO A
JOIN Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS B ON B.HANDLE = A.USUARIO
JOIN K_CRM_PERFORMANCESEMANA C ON A.HANDLE = C.PERFORMANCEANO
JOIN K_CRM_PERFORMANCEITEM D ON C.HANDLE = D.PERFORMANCESEMANA
JOIN K_CRM_PERFORMANCETIPO E ON E.HANDLE = D.TIPO
WHERE A.USUARIO = @USUARIO
AND DATEADD(WEEK,-1,GETDATE()) BETWEEN C.DATAINICIO AND C.DATAFIM
AND YEAR(GETDATE()) = YEAR(A.ANO)
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="NOME" From="A" Path="NOME" /> <Field Alias="META" From="A" Path="META" /> <Field Alias="REALIZADO" From="A" Path="REALIZADO" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
